segments.text: Northward Airlines . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'd like to reconfirm my flight , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name and flight number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Daniel Adams and my flight number is 374 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold the line , please . ( ... ) All right . Your seat is confirmed , Mr . Adams . You'll be arriving in Buenos Aires at 4 o'clock p . m . local time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Can I pick up my ticket when I check in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but please check in at least one hour before departure time .
segments.speaker: S1
